body:
@パパが大好き💕
what the fuck is wrong with you? if loli-themed hentai are the best!
I'm not much into loli-themed hentai but these are good! Every degenerate's dream is for an anime version to be created.
What’s up fellow pedos
The one at page 66 was very interesting, I tought he'd just keep raping them in a row but he actually think about why he's lonely
heeeeeelll yeah
I want to have sex with little girls
God bless u, i cum
I want to see the translated version of the next Kiya Shii's awahime chapter (12), or at least the raw version, instead I got this 1/10... Still, a good effort from the translation team.
Guess it's time to read actually read this now that we're done with this one.
Just upsets me, we’re all already degenerates, no sense in further dividing ourselves :/

I get not being aroused by rape/blackmail and things like, I honestly do. It’s not like it’s all I get off too either, but that doesn’t make this doujins objectively bad. 

Art is good, story (regardless of what you think of the outcome) is quite well written, and each story is fairly well paced and a decent length. Not liking something and calling something “bad” are becoming far to intertwined with each other these days :/

People have fetishes, some people (like me) have fetishes that are particularly unacceptable to others. But in my experience, other than a few autistic trolls, the community who airs on my side of things usually stays in their comments section or just doesn’t talk on other doujins comments section. Yet the “vanilla” community here: and on other sites such as reddit or hentai sites, very often complain if not demonize this type of content (even when tags exist for a reason) simply for it existing and act like they have some morale high ground :/
I see. Good stuff
@Siarz the chapter on page 118 isn't vanilla but I found it kind of sweet. Her john aims to make her feel good when others never have.
this is just depressing, go read awa no ohimesama thank
Agree vvvvv
I get my rocks off to this @reverie00 I also get my cock as hard as those rocks then I shoot fucking jizz everywhere
Is there any chapter that's worth it for vanilla fans? This looks like all rape/NTR-ish.
>Reverie00 Troll harder fuckface.
@Reverie00: If you're referring to this dumpster fire of a doujin then I can see where you're coming from but vanilla/loli exist for a reason you know? Unless you're referring to all loli in general.
This is the shit law enforcement should tackle head on instead of wasting tax payers' money killing negroes. Can't imagine what sick fucks get their rocks off to this shit...
